hero.title: Consular Services of the
hero.subtitle: Your consulate, wherever you are in the world
hero.description: Access all your consular services online: passport, visa, civil status, consular registration and much more.

services.title: Consular Services
services.description: Discover all the services offered by the consular representations of the Gabonese Republic abroad.

passport.title: Passport
passport.description: Application, renewal and tracking of your Gabonese passport. Simplified and secure process.

visa.title: Visa
visa.description: Visa applications for Gabon. Tourist, business, work and other categories.

civilStatus.title: Civil Status
civilStatus.description: Birth, marriage, death certificates. Transcription and legalization of documents.

registration.title: Consular Registration
registration.description: Register in the registry of Gabonese nationals abroad. Stay informed and protected.

legalization.title: Legalization
legalization.description: Authentication and legalization of your official documents for international use.

emergency.title: Emergency Assistance
emergency.description: Consular assistance in emergencies: lost documents, difficulties abroad.

consulates.title: Gabonese Consulates Worldwide
consulates.description: Find the nearest Gabonese consulate to carry out your administrative procedures.

citizenCta.title: Create Your Gabonese Citizen Account
citizenCta.description: A single account to access all online consular services. Simplify your administrative procedures wherever you are in the world.

tracking.title: Real-time tracking
tracking.description: Track the progress of your applications at any time

appointments.title: Simplified appointments
appointments.description: Book your slots in just a few clicks

citizenCta.testimonial: Thanks to Consulat.ga, I was able to renew my passport from London without having to travel. Fast and efficient service!

brand.name: Consulat.ga
brand.description: Official platform for consular services of the Gabonese Republic for citizens residing abroad.

newsletter.title: Stay Informed
newsletter.description: Subscribe to our newsletter to receive the latest consular news.

footer.copyright: © {{year}} Consulat.ga - Gabonese Republic. All rights reserved.

notFound.heading: Page not found
notFound.description: Sorry, the page you are looking for does not exist or has been moved.

appointments.slotNotAvailable: This time slot is not available

orgs.memberNotFound: User is not a member of this organization
orgs.cannotRemoveSelf: You cannot remove yourself from the organization

services.alreadyActivated: Service is already activated for this organization
services.notAvailable: This service is not currently available
